attributes.action: Announce an immediate commitment to provided assistance to Greece in the current forest fires disaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU and other countries are already providing assitance to Greece to assist her with the current forest fire disaster.

So far there has been no specific offer of help from the United Kingdom.

The Prime Minister should show compassion to the Greek people and rectify this immediately and commit Britain to provide fire-fighting, medical, logistical and if necessary military assistance.
